title: Hypnotic patterns
description: Use a loop to draw a hypnotic pattern.

steps.hint: Our hynotic pattern needs a cool background color. **Type** `background aquamarine`
Our spiral should have a nice big stroke. **Type** `stroke 10`

We want to draw 20 circles. If we did it the old way and wrote each circle out that would take a very long time. We can use a loop and a variable to repeat the action, and change the variable every time the loop runs. **Type** `for i in [20 .. 0]`
Weâ€™re going to use the `i` variable our loop made for us to set how big the circle should be. **Type** `circle 10 * i`

completion_text: Wow! That appeared out of nowhere. Click and use the slider with the number '10' on the last line. See if you can figure out what it does.
